document.full_text: one doesn't go to rio searching for the meaning of life at carnivale and neither will you find it in "rio," a tropical-colored 3d animated wingding that will have kids and their chaperones shaking a tail feather to its pulsating latin beats.
document.title: "rio" a fun animated frolic
lines_and_colors: one doesn't go to rio searching for the meaning of life at carnivale and neither will you find it in "rio," a tropical-colored 3d animated wingding that will have kids and their chaperones shaking a tail feather to its pulsating latin beats.
